title: Let's Play Together!
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Finally, you do this here.... like this. See, it’s easy, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Mhmm. Lanzhu got it! Let’s see.... like this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>That’s right! You’re good at this, Lanzhu-chan! This knitted doll doesn’t look like it was made by a first-timer!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Heh! Lanzhu can do anything!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufufu, it seems like it. I’m kind of jealous.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>But that’s because you taught me! Lanzhu wouldn’t miss a single thing you taught me! Because Lanzhu loves you, Ayumu!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ahaha, you always say that to me, huh, Lanzhu-chan? But whenever I hear that, I feel relieved and confident.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Were you not confident before, Ayumu? That makes no sense! You should be more confident in yourself! You’re a wonderful person!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Thank you, Lanzhu-chan. Hey, would you like to try something more challenging next time? Since you’re pretty skillful, I’d like to teach you lace knitting. Let’s make something together.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyaaah! Lanzhu loves a challenge! Plus, it’s with my beloved Ayumu, so it’s the best! Let’s try lace knitting♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
